main event: A civilian reported observing a UFO in the Gulf of Mexico with an approximate diameter of 15 ft, featuring a shaped nose and a transparent window containing wiring and electrical coils.
interesting points: The object was painted red and had a silver-colored top approximately 3 ft long., The observant believed it to be a new type of weather reporting buoy that had broken free from its moorings., It was described as having an unusual design with discernible features through the transparent window., The sighting was recorded as ground-visual without any optical aids., The investigation concluded that the object could potentially be a weather balloon illuminated by the full moon.
sighted object: a red UFO with a shaped nose and transparent window
